div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviij die nouembris
anno quo supra

The saide day Alexander brabner' grantit him borghe' and dettour' to Johne grige for iij s'
for Donald' Smytht quhilkis the ballieis chargit him pay within terme of law

The saide day Johne of nydrie lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit to ansuer
to the borghe' fundin one him be thomas Waus that quhar he was clerk
tile thmas Scottis schip et cetera he aw to ger' deliuer to him ane pece of Rynsche
of wyne or ellis fynde him ane dettour et cetera tharfor the ballieis ordanit William
Scrimgeor officiar' to pas' and tak ane distres' of the saide Johne and lat it
agan to borghe' and it be askit and tak Souerte of him to entir befor tham
to morne to ansuer' to the saide borge as secunde day of process'

The saide day Johne ramsay grantit to pay to Jonhne grig xxij s' and vj d'
to' Johne of Johnstone within xv dais but ony lang' delay
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die nouembris anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne nydrie lauchfullie warnit callit and comperit to ansuer'
to the borghe' fundin one him be thomas Waus et cetera wald' nocht ansuer'
besekand' the balyeis to continew the said borghe' quhile gilbert menyeis
war' present tharfor the balyeis assignit and ordanit the officiaris to tak souerte
of the saide Johne to comper xx day of the said' monetht of
Nouembir to Ansuer to the said' borghe' as thrid' day of process'

Eodem die henricus Orvm fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Johannem
mar' suum verum legittimum et Indubitatem procuratorem Irreuocabilem nobilem Actorem factorem
et cetera Dandum et concedens eisdem suam liberam et omnimodam potestatem ac
mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad prosequendum plegium
aliis per eum porrectum super georgium talyour' et cetera penes
Agendum calumpniandum defendendum Ceteram
omnia alia et singula faciendum et cetera promittens de Rato et grato in
vberiore forma procuratorij cum ceteris terminis et clausulis necessariis
et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
penultimo die mensis Nouembris Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day the borgh' fundin on' be george talyour be henry orvin
for the wranguis' Intrometting and' withhalding fra him of
houshald' gair extending to xxtj pundis the tyme he was takin
in Ingland' was fundin of Nane awaile be ane suorne
assis' Alexander red forspekar for the quhilkis the said' henry
was in ane amerciament of the court And' the said' georg' was quit
of his challance et cetera

The said day the bailyeis assignit this day xv dais to gilbert
menyeis to bring his warand' to freith' him of the gudis of ayr
schip pertnyng to thomas chamer ayr tile vmquhill William
chamer as law will

The said day Williame Dougles' at the ferry bait oblist
him be the faitht of his bodie to pay to Dauid steuart viij
lax betuix this and the fest of Sanct Johnne' callit myd
symmer nixt heireftir for thome Douglas his Sone of
the quhilkis the werst lax salbe wortht xij d'

The said day it was statut and ordanit be the bailyeis and counsaile
riplie auisit for the vphaldin and perseuerans of the auld' louabile
honor consuetud and rit of the said' burgh vsit and sustenit in tymes
bigane in the honor of thar glorius patroun' Sanct nicholes that
ale personis burges nichtbouris burges and burges sonnys habille to
rid' to decoir and' honor the toun' in thar array conuenient tharto sale Rid'
with the abbot and' prior of bonacord' one euery Sanct nicholes day throu
the toune as vis' and' wont has bein quhen' thai ar warnit be the sad'
abbot and' prior obefor And' gif ony man hawand' tak of wateris
and' fisching of the tone habill to rid' be warnit be the said' abbot and
prior of bonacord' and' wile nocht rid' sale tyn' thar takis quhilkis
thai haue of the toune at the nixt assedacioun' bot gif thai haue
ane ressonable' caus' and Impediment that thai may nocht rid' quhilkis
thai sale schaw and be considerit be the Alderman' bailyeis
and' counsale Obefor And' vthir personis beand warnit habile
to Rid And' failyeis tharin without ane ressonable caus' schawin to
the aldirman bailyeis and' counsaile for the tyme sale pay to
Sanct nicholes werk xxtj vneforgevin And' viij s' to the bailyes
for thar vnlaw

The said day Johnne nyddre burges of montros' was conuict' be ane
suorne assis' Alexander red' forspekar for the stribulance of Richerd Waus
youngar for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court and' to
amend' as law will et cetera And' the said Richard quyt of ale stribu
lance of the said' Jhonne' the said' partiis beand oblist to stand' at the
ordinance of the said' assis' thai de ordanit the said' Jhonn' to sit
done one his kne and beseik the bailyes and' counsaile to
pray the said' Richerd' to forgiw the said' Jhonne' And the sad'
Jhonne' to pay iij li' of walx to the hale blud licht

The said' day the borgh' fundin be georg bisset one Alexander brabner for
the wranguis distructione of ane lofthous' pertenyng to Katherin prat
his spous' was fundin of nane awaile be ane suorn' assis' Alexander
red' forspekar for the quhilk the said' georg was in ane amerciament of the court and
the said' Alexander quyt of his challance

The said day Johnne bisset Officiar to my lord' of Abirdene replegit
Johnne' Andirsone in the peldsid' to my lord' of Abirdenis court and
fand' thome riddaile souerte that Justice salbe ministerit to William Dou
gles in the said' lordis court betuix this and' yuyll nixt hereftir at
the cumin of Androw elphinstone of Selmys bailye to the said' lord'
anent ane hors' clamit be the said' William

The said day the bailyes assignit monunday that nixt cumis to James
Kennertj and' his wif to cum befor thame for ministracioun of Justice
anent the borgh' fundin one hir be patry walcar for the wrang
uis' withhalding fra him of ane stane of woll demi quarter of heklit
lynt ix waris clewis ij wesching tubbis ane Inglis' groit xxtj
cartfule of Eldin and' ordnit the sad' James to ansueir to
the said' borgh' the said' day becaus he Entirit forspekar for his
said' wif and or ellis to Entir hir to ansuer to the samyn

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
Secundo die mensis Decembris Anno quo supra

The said day Johnne Kennerty askit the bailyes pament of ij barellis of salmond'
optenit be him one Johnne balcromy And' thai grantit to ger price tua
counpteris of his for the red' of the said' salmonf' be suorn' personis eftir
the forme of law and' mak him be content within terme of law

The said' day Wille baxtar alias Johnesoun' grantit him avand' to Alexander
gray x s' iij d' quhilkis the bailyeis chargit him to pay within terme
of law

The said day Elspet Waus spous' of patry chirnsid' was conuict be
an suorn assis' Johne mar forspekar for Sellin of wyn' witht ane
wranguis' poynt for the quhilkis sche was in ane amerciament of the court et cetea
and to amend as law will et cetera

The said day Elspet Waus was in ane amerciament for the court be hir
avin toung graunt for the stribulance of Johnne of mar for the And' to
amend as law wile and forbeir in tyme to cum et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem 3o
die mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day James Kennertj ande Robert Kennertj was conuict be thir
personis Alexander menyeis Dauid menyeis Alexander Red gilbert menyeis Johne' of
Ratre Johne of mar Johne blak Johne of Waus alexander malisone Williame
Rollande Recharde Waus William Kintor Dauid blindseil alexander prat Androw
fif James strathachin cristofor prat William colp henry Red patrij
Red' and Androw bodie burges of the saide burghe' suorn in ane assis' ale
agane the tovne ande in brekin of thar atht wranguisly agane the tovne
pretending thame to mak dirogacione of the tovnis patronag of sanct
Dathac' altar and to dispone tharuppone quhilk pertenis to disposicione of the
haile tovne q for the quhilk Ilk ane of thame was in amerciament of the court
et cetera to amende as law wile ande forber in tym to cum

The saide day malcome crag accusit for contempcione conspiracione ande brekin
of his aitht agane the tovne fande gilbert menyeis and Robert of crag souerty
to entir the ferde day of December Instante tile ansuer in the premiss'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die
mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day malcome crag entirit and fande gilbert menyeis and Robert crag
souerte for tile comper' befor the aldirmane bailyeis and counsaile at the
aldirmannis hamcuming quhen' euer he be warnit tharto tile ansuer in the
premiss'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In preorio eiusdem ix die Decembris
anno quo supra

The said day Robert henrison' was in ane Amerciament of the court be his avne tong
gravnt for forstalling of the burghe in bying of skinnis Ande conuict be ane
Suorne assis' gilbert menyeis forspekar for forstalling of the burghe bying' hidis

The saide Syme nichole was in ane amerciament of the court be his avne
tong gravnt for forstalling of the burghe in bying of hidis skinnis
and for Regrating

The said' day Johne heroune was in amerciament' of the court and for the forstalling
of the burghe' in bying of skinnis et cetera be his avne toung gravntis

The said' day Androw portar was in Amerciament' of the courtis be his avn' tong'
graunt for forstalling of the burghe in bying of Skinnis et cetera Ande was
conuict be ane Suorne assis' gilbert menyes forspekar for forstalling of the
burghe in Regrating et cetera

The said' day Jonhne brabner was in Amerciament of the courtis be his avne graunt
for forstalling of the burghe in bying of Stannis et cetera

The saide day Johne brabner oblist him to entir Androw brabner his
brothir befor the aldirman balyeis and denez' of gild' one the law day nixt
eftir yule vndir the pane of xl s'

The said' day Johne thomsone grantit him aving to William Rate viij s'
to be pait within terme of law

The saide day the balyeis assignit the law day next eftir yule to thome
philp to ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be Jhon' horne for the
wranguis' haldin fra him of xx bowsteingis and demi barrel of Saip

The said' day James gourlay grantit him aving to Alexander gray fiftj s'
to be pait within terme of law

Eodem die Johannes Wilyongsone conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore mat
thei branche prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Willelmum Rollande Et Idem Willelmus
conuictus fuit per perturbio dicti Johannis et quilibet alteri emendabit ut Jura volunt
et dictus Willelmus conuictus de perturbio vxoris prefati Johannis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiij die mensis Decembris
Anno quo supra et cetera

Eodem die Johannes Ratre deuenit plegius legalis quod thomas leslie erit
Indempnes pro Dauid steuart aliter quam per viam Juris Et thomas Riddale
erit I deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus thomas leslie erit Indempnis pro
dicto Dauid aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem die Donaldus sawer conuictus per assisam Juratam ex ore Willelmj colpe
pro perturbio curie

The said day the bailjes assignit the law day eftir yuyll to gilbert litstar
to ansuer to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne arthour for the wrang
uis' haldin fra him of xxvj li' with the mair for tua pipis of wad'

The said' day William Walcar and marione hutchone was oblist and suorne
to stand' at the deliuerance of thomas Watsone and Androw stevinsone anent
ane scheir and ale vthir acrtonis debatable' betuix thame

Eodem die elena Knollis et mariota Knollis fecerunt constituerunt
et ordinarunt Willelmum oudny de eodem suum legittimum procuratorem actorem et factorem
ad petendum et recipiendum annuos redditus suos infra dictum burgum et
in manibus aliis actionibus ipsas concernens de receptis acquitandum
agendum defendum prosequendum promittens de rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij

The said day gilbert menyeis lauchfully warnit callit and
nocht comperit to ansuer at the Instance of thomas chamer
for the gudis of ayrschip pertenyng to him be decess' of vm
quhile William chamer as caucionar for Alexander chamer tharfor
the bailyes ordanit gilbert preston' and latt it agane to borghe
and It be askit and' warne him to compeir the nixt
law day eftir yuyll as secund' day of proces' to ansuer
for the said airschip et cetera

The said day the bailyes assignit monunday that nixt
cumis to ser androw collisone to preiw that Johnne thom
sone occupeis ane hous' awand' certane annuell to him
and mastir Alexander fiff and the said' Johnne the stoppis
William buchane fra the Entere of the said' hous' quhilk
setto him And the sad' Johnne Occupeis the said'
hous' and withhaldis the annuell fra thame the sad' sere
Androw and mastir Alexander

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xvjo die mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day Jhon' of Cullane Come Souerte be his hand
vphaldin to the balyeis that this tovne salbe Skathtles
for canny cullane for the hous' quhilk scho Occupeis
of his halding fyr' in It but ane chymnay

The saide day Syme elloun' was in ane Amerciament of the court
be his avne tong graunt for the brekin of common' ordi
nance that he Raid nocht at Sanct nicholes day et cetera

The saide day Johne patirsone was conuict be ane Suorne assis' mathow
branche forspekar for brekin of commone ordinance that he raid' nocht one
Sanct nicholes day with the abbat and prior of bonaycord' to decoir' the
for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the court and to amende as law wil
and forber' in tym to Cum

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die mensis
Decembris Anno quo supra

The saide day Dauy Syme was conuict be ane Suorne assis' patry
rede forspekar for trubulance of Donald baxtar for the quhilk he was
in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and to Amende as law wile and forber' in
tyme to Cum Ande the saide Donalde was quyt of al strubulance of
the said' Dauy be the said' assis' Ande atour the saide assis' ordanit
Cera the aid' Dauy to pay j li' of wax to the hald blud' licht et cetera

The saide day Comperit Williame scrimgeor ane of the Offiicaris of the
said burghe' Ande thai' sufficientlie producit certane Suorne personis
burges of the said' burghe quhilkis be thar' aithez deponit that the said'
William hed presentit tua comptoris burdis and ane prewis' Coffir' of
Johne of balcromeis to the mercat thre mercat days offering tham
to sell for tua barrellis Salmond' aucht be him to Johne of Kennertj
Ande the ferd' mercar day thai war' prisit to thre li' and tene schillingis
tharfor the balyeis chargit the said' officiar' to pas' and offir' the said'
comptouris and Coffir' to the saide Johne balcrome for the saide Some
Ande gif he refusit to tak thame of the said' price to deliuer
thame to the saide Johne of Kennertj of the saide price in part of
pament of the said' tua barrellis of Salmond' according to Justice et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxo die mensis
Decembris Anno quo supra

The said day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' ser Johne ruther
furd' forspekar that Dauid mar sone and' ayr tile vmquhile thomas
mar sale deliuer to William blinseill ale chartiris and' writis quhilkis
he has of the sad' Williamis lannd' Incontinent And' the said' William
to pay to the said' Dauy demi barell of grils' at mydsymmer nixt heir
eftir or ellis ane french' croune of gold' And' the said' William
to fynd him souerte for the pament of the samyne Incontinent thar
eftir the said' William fand' William blinseill coupar souerte for the
pament of the said' demi barelli grils' or frenche crone Ande
he to releiwe the saide William blinseill coupar And' William scrim
geour officiar at command' of the bailyeis chargit the said Dauy
to remane within the tolbuth vnto the tyme he deliuerit the said'
chartir and euidencis to the said' William blinseill

The said' day It was statut' ande ordanit be the counsale with
avys' consent and assent of the baxtaris that ale the baxtaris of
this burghe' sale furnis' and provid' the toune witht breid' of quhet
And' bak ij penny bred' weinge xxviij vnce and penny brede
weing xiiij vnce gude cleyne stuf weile boutit and bakin' Ande
that thai sale nocht want Redy bakin breid' to Sustene the town'
vndir the panis contenit in the actis ande statutis maid' obefor
And' that thai sale nocht draw thar' breid' quhile thai ger' warne
thar' balye and officiar' of the quartar quhar thai duell to Cum and
se thar' breid' weyt vndir the pane of ane amerciament vnforgevin
Ande of the brekin of common' ordinance thai being thris' conuict'
